title: After I insert and remove the headset, my phone's screen will freeze (cannot be unlocked when I swipe on the screen or cannot be turned on when I press the power button) for 2 to 3 minutes until my phone detects the headset's status. What can I do?
answer: [Update your phone to the latest version. This is a compatibility issue on the Qualcomm 8916 platform of the Qualcomm software baseline.]()
